Regarding checked baggage fees, our airline's policy includes 15 kg of checked baggage allowance in the ticket price of ₹3,500. If you need to check-in more than 15 kg, you can purchase additional baggage allowance at a fee of ₹250 per kg. You can purchase this additional allowance online through our website or mobile app, or at the airport check-in counter on the day of your flight.

Please note that any excess baggage beyond the allowed 15 kg will be charged at the airport, and the rate may vary depending on the airport and availability.
